pluginRequiredUserLocale.content: This action requires that you select one of the available languages.

serverNotMeetPluginCriteria.content: This server does not meet the criteria for this plugin. Please contact the bot developer

interactionOnly.content: Hey {{user.tag}}, This channel is for **Slash Command** only, you cannot use regular command or start conversation.

warning.content:
Hey <@{{user.id}}>,
You seems are sending message in the wrong thread. Head to your thread <#{{active.thread.id}}> and start sending message there!

timeout.content:
Hey <@{{user.id}}>,
You have sent a lot of messages on thread that is not yours! I had to timeout you for a while. (Your thread has been closed due to your bad behavior)

thread.content:
<@&{{support.role.id}}>

Hello <@{{user.id}}>, please wait for one of the technical support to contact you in this thread.

interaction.content: Thread has been created. One of our technical support will contact you in this <#{{thread.id}}> thread.

**Would you mind taking a minute to tell us how we did?**
just two quick questions if you don't mind.
You left the thread and no assistant came to help you with your issue. Can you provide a reason for leaving the thread?

thread.content: How would you rate your overall thread experience with **{{assistant.tag}}**?

service.content: How satisfied are you with our services?

activeThread.content: You have an active thread in the assistance channel, please contact technical support through <#{{thread.id}}>

set.content: English language has been set. You will be shown the helpdesk channel and it will be presented in English.

articles.article: كيف أقوم بأضافة البوت الى السيرفر الخاص بي؟
